name: Hidden Intentions
description:
My submission to the GDS Fall-o-ween Jam 2021.
You infiltrate a party with the intention of eating the delicious food from the VIP room. Talk to the other partygoers to find out their personalities, then disguise yourself as them to get past the VIP security!
Use of the theme "Hide!": You're hiding the intention of only coming to the party for the food.

Programmed and put together by me.
Character dialogue by Nathan Hayes.
Ideas from C. Harwood and Nathan Hayes.
Music: TheLongestYear by CyberLeaf (ModernLoFiAmbient Pack)
Visual Assets: RPG Worlds Snowylands and Houses & Interiors
Character Sprites: Omega Modern Graphics Pack
